scripts.build: pnpm run preflight && pnpm -r run build
scripts.green:verify: cd api && npx prisma validate && npx prisma generate && cd .. && pnpm run preflight && pnpm -w typecheck && pnpm -w build
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter api prisma generate && pnpm run db:reset
scripts.db:reset: pnpm --filter api prisma migrate reset --force && pnpm run db:seed
scripts.pipeline:relaxed: pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-featurizer.ts && pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-scorer.ts && THESIS_RELAXED=1 pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-thesis.ts
scripts.pipeline:strict: pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-featurizer.ts && pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-scorer.ts && THESIS_RELAXED=0 THESIS_MIN_COMPS_90=5 THESIS_MAX_VOL_BP=1200 THESIS_MAX_FRESH_DAYS=14 pnpm dlx tsx scripts/run-thesis.ts
scripts.ingest:cc:comps: pnpm dlx tsx scripts/load-thin-json.ts --comps data/research/comps_collectorcrypt.json --source CollectorCrypt --limit 200000
scripts.pipeline:live: pnpm run collect:sold:ebay && tsx scripts/run-featurizer.ts && tsx scripts/run-scorer.ts && pnpm run pipeline:strict
